price: (4) We have certainly created man in the best of stature;[1948]
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
footnotes: [1948]- i.e., upright, symmetrical, and balanced in form and nature.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: laqad khalaqnā al-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīmin
